text: Sered tsykh khto ye yevreysʹkyy, deyakyy vykryvlyayemo slova poza pravdoyu, ta yak kazhutʹ, "My chuyemo, ale my ne pidkoryayemosʹ," ta "Vashi slova padayutʹ na hlukhykh vushrakh," ta "Raa'ena (vmiyutʹ nash pastukh), tomu shcho vony krutyatʹ yikhni yazyky vysmiyaty relihiyu. Vony skazaly, "My chuyemo, ta my pidkoryayemosʹ," ta "My chuyemo vas," ta "Unzurna (hodynnyk nad namy)," yomu bulo b krashche dlya nykh, ta bilʹshe spravedlyvymy. Zamistʹ tsʹoho, vony zaznaly osudu z BOHA zavdyaky yikhnʹomu disbelief. Otzhe, bilʹshistʹ z nykh ne mozhe poviryty
